name: Run Amy, run
description:
Controls: Space to jump and A to dash

This is a tiny horror game I made for Halloween. I made it for a video, where me and and a fellow Youtuber tried to make the spookiest game in 12 hours. You can check out the video here:CREDITS:

Art kit: https://hello-tazzina.itch.io/green-woods and https://hello-tazzina.itch.io/greenwoods-ii
Eli: https://retryeli.com/
Matthew Pablo (game music): https://matthewpablo.com/
